attributes.action: Award Munir Hussain an MBE for services to the community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In defending his home and family Munir Hussain showed great courage, while at the same time delivering a message to the parasites that blight our society - We will not stand for this.

The dysfunctional legal system might have deemed this to have been an illegal act, but when have the law and justice ever gone hand in hand.   We as a grateful nation have the chance to recognise his sacrifice and duly reward him with an MBE.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
